casebody.data:
Simpson, Exr., Appellee, v. City of Niles Police Department et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Simpson v. Niles Police Dept. (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 201.]

*202(Nos. 00-580 and 00-807 Submitted February 28, 2001 Decided March 28, 2001.) Reminger & Reminger Co., L.P.A., and Nick C. Tomino, for appellants.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Stevens v. Ackman (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 182, 743 N.E.2d 901.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
